title: Dark Heresy 2nd Edition RPG bundle
description:
A bundle of so-far released FF's 'Dark Heresy 2nd Edition' RPG material. I've extensively revamped the bookmarks in the Core Rulebook for lethally quick access and easy gaming, since the rules reference could be a bit of a pain with this one. This bundle also includes all the necessary sheets and supplements from FF's site. Enjoy, and remember : "Innocence proves nothing."

This torrent includes:

Dark Heresy 2E - DH19 - Core Rulebook (bookmarked).pdf
Dark Heresy 2E - DH20 - Game Master's Kit Book.pdf
Dark Heresy 2E - DH20 - Game Master's Kit Screen.pdf
Dark Heresy 2E - DH22 - Forgotten Gods.pdf
Dark Heresy 2E - DH23 - Enemies Within.pdf
Dark Heresy Character Creation Supplement (web).pdf
enemies_within_character_creation_supplement_web.pdf

+++

dark_heresy_clue_generator.pdf
dark_heresy_encounter_sheet.pdf
dark_heresy_gm_sheet.pdf
dark_heresy_npc__vehicle_sheets.pdf
dark_heresy_pc_sheet.pdf
dark_heresyseeds_of_heresy_web.pdf

All you could ever possibly need to run the entire DH2E campaign in a blink!
If you like it, buy the Core Rulebook at least. I did. But be sure to keep it on the shelf and worship it there, because it's too fraggin' huge and bulky it'll broke apart in very few game sessions. 

Cheers and happy grim&dark gaming! Hope you'll enjoy the bookmarks! :P
